Control Room	Interior of the control room for fluid catalytic cracking units. Operator punching the buttons which activates the plate rappers on the units.  This operation is periodic- ever two hours- and shakes the catalyst to keep it from getting caked. French Coffee	Making French coffee. Coffee is made by the drip method. About eight ounces of freshly roasted and ground coffee used to make one quart of coffee.
